attributes.title: Every Time Tyaga Is Cognised And Manifested, You Raise To The Next Level Of Existence
attributes.description:
29 FEBRUARY 2020 (8 AM IST, SATURDAY)

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE TODAY:

*EVERY TIME ‘TYAGA’ IS COGNISED AND MANIFESTED, YOU RAISE TO THE NEXT LEVEL OF EXISTENCE.

*USUALLY, THE BIGGEST QUESTION I FACE FROM DISCIPLES AND DEVOTEES IS: I DON'T FEEL LIKE DOING TYAGA, WHAT TO DO?

*THE MIND WILL NEVER SUPPORT YOU IN THE DECISION OF TYAGA BECAUSE, HOW WILL THE MIND GIVE UP ITS RIGHT OVER YOU?! IT CONTROLS YOU THROUGH CONFUSION AND THROUGH KEEPING YOU POWERLESS. TYAGA IS LIKE A FIRE AND MIND IS LIKE A FUNGUS. IT THRIVES IN THE DARK DIRTY WATER THAT IS STAGNANT IN A CORNER. HOW WILL THE MIND ALLOW THE EXISTENCE OF TYAGA IN YOU? NO! IT WILL TRY ITS BEST TO STOP YOU.

*IF YOU ATE RADISH,YOU WILL BELCH RADISH SMELL. IF YOU ATE CONFUSION, POWERLESSNESS-BASED THOUGHTS, YOU WILL BELCH POWERLESSNESS, FEAR AND INSECURITY.’

*PEOPLE TELL ME, ‘I MAY TRY TO DO TYAGA NOW, BUT I MAY COLLAPSE AFTER A YEAR.’ FOOL! MORE AND MORE TYAGA WILL ONLY RAISE YOU! PEOPLE TELL ME, ‘EVEN IF I TAKE SANYAS NOW, I MAY FAIL LATER.’ FAILURES HAPPEN ONLY IN MARRIAGE. SANYAS IS LIKE HAVING EVERYTHING IN YOUR BANK ACCOUNT. A SANYASI CAN MARRY ANY TIME HE WANTS BUT A GRIHASTHA CANNOT BECOME A SANYASI ANY TIME HE WANTS! IN GRIHASTHA, IT IS LIFE SPENT ALREADY! I AM NOT ENCOURAGING ANYTHING SPECIFIC HERE!

*THE ABSOLUTE DELUSION IS YOU EXPECTING YOUR DELUDED MIND TO SUPPORT YOU IN TYAGA!

*THE BODY IS FULL OF TOXINS AND THE MIND IS FULL OF CONFIDENCELESSNESS, FEARS AND POWERLESSNESS. HOW WILL YOUR MIND INSPIRE YOU FOR TYAGA?

*ONLY THE CONSCIOUS, FEROCIOUS DECISION CAN MAKE YOU POWERFUL, AND THAT IS TYAGA!

*LET ME EXPLAIN TYAGA: IF YOU ARE IN AN ACCIDENT AND YOU ARE ALMOST GONE AND YOU HAVE ONE MORE BREATH YOU HAVE TO PUSH YOU OUT OF YOUR VEHICLE, THEN COLLECTING YOUR WHOLE ENERGY IN PUSHING YOU OUT AND DECLARING: ‘I AM DECLARING TYAGA OF THIS OLD MIND…’ IS TYAGA!

*TYAGA WILL NEVER HAPPEN OUT OF YOUR MIND GETTING CONVINCED AND SUPPORTING YOU. IT IS NOT LIKE A VACATION YOU ARE PLANNING WHERE EVERYTHING SUPPORTS YOU. TYAGA IS A BREAKTHROUGH IN YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS. ALL THE BEST MOMENTS IN MY LIFE WAS WHEN DECISIONS WERE MADE IN UTTER TYAGA.

*NEVER GO BACK TO WHAT YOU VOMITED. NEVER GO BACK TO THE SECURED, COZY, SUPPORTING AMBIENCE. RENOUNCE EVERY LEVEL AS YOU GO HIGHER, BUT NEVER COME DOWN!

*I HAVE SEEN HOW TYAGA WORKS. WHEN I LEFT THE HOUSE TO BUILD ONE ASHRAM IN TIRUCHENGODE, BEFORE EVEN I COMPLETED THAT ONE ASHRAM IN TIRUCHENGODE, I LEFT TIRUCHENGODE TO BUILD A HUGE SANGA IN BANGALORE. BEFORE I COMPLETED THAT, I RENOUNCED THAT TOO TO BUILD THIS KAILASA NATION! BUT NOTHING HAS LEFT ME! I HAVE NOT RENOUNCED ANYTHING!

*TYAGA WILL CHANGE THE WHOLE SPACE INSIDE YOU.

*YOU DONT LOSE ANYTHING IN TYAGA, YOU ONLY LOSE THE POWERLESS MENTAL SETUP THAT. YOU BREAK THAT! DO NOT EXPECT YOUR MIND TO GET CONVINCED ABOUT TYAGA. IF YOUR MIND IS CONVINCED, THEN IT IS CUNNINGNESS OR A TRAP.

*TYAGA IS WHEN YOU DECIDE: I HEARD ABOUT PARAMASHIVA, I DON'T HAVE THE COMPLETE ROUTE TO PARAMASHIVA. WITH THE LITTLE KNOWN ROUTE, I WILL FLY TOWARDS PARAMASHIVA. THE POWER TO TAKE ABSOLUTE RISK, IS TYAGA! NO QUESTION OF TURNING BACK!

*EVERY TIME PEOPLE ARE DELUDED, THE ONLY QUESTION THEY RAISE IS: ‘I DON'T HAVE THE CONFIDENCE AND DECISION TO DO TYAGA.’ ONLY NOW YOU SHOULD DO TYAGA BECAUSE YOU ARE SICK AND DELUDED! YOU NEED TO BREAK THE OLD IDENTITIES AND FEARS, THROWING AWAY ALL SECURITIES. THAT IS TYAGA.

*TYAGA BREATHES ABSOLUTE FRESH LIFE INTO YOU. IT ACTUALLY BREATHES FRESH LIFE SITUATIONS, UNDERSTANDINGS, ENERGY INTO YOU.

*TYAGA IS ALWAYS A MOMENTARY DECISION TO EXPERIENCE HIGHER CONSCIOUSNESS, WHETHER IN YOUR HEALTH OR ANYTHING ELSE. IF YOU HAVE TASTED TYAGA IN UTTER INSECURITY, WHERE YOU WALKED OUT OF SOME OF THE WORST SUFFOCATING SITUATIONS AND YOU NEVER WENT BACK TO IT AND WENT ONLY AHEAD, YOU WILL EVEN WALK OUT OF CANCER, BECAUSE ONCE YOU TASTE TYAGA, IT BECOMES YOUR VERY BIOMEMORY.

*A PERSON WHO HAS TASTED PURE SANYAS WILL UNDERSTAND. I HAVE WALKED OUT OF MULTIPLE SUFFOCATING SITUATIONS IN MY LIFE AND NEVER LOOKED BACK! I HAVE NEVER EVEN THOUGHT ABOUT LOOKING BACK.

*ONCE, ARUNAGIRI YOGISHWARA TOLD ME, ‘ONLY A DOG WILL EAT WHAT IT VOMITED, NOT HUMAN BEINGS!’ SO ONCE YOU HAVE RENOUNCED AND MOVED, MOVE HEAD, MARCH AHEAD, NEVER LOOKING BACK.

*TODAY I WILL INITIATE ALL OF YOU INTO THIS POWERFULNESS OF TYAGA AS ENERGY - CONSCIOUSNESS.

ASK THE AVATAR QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS
